result.name: Whole genome sequencing analysis of Indian yak populations
result.description: whole genome sequencing approach was used for genomic variants identification in Indian yaks. Total 30 yaks belonging to three different Indian geographic locations were used for this study. The WGS data was generated using the Illumina 150 bp paired end technology and Standard Broad Genomics Platform was followed to call SNPs and indels.
result.center: ICAR- National Bureau of Animal Genetic Resources (NBAGR),
